skins.shipDescription: Pennsylvania-class Battleship ¨C Arizona, Hull Number BB-39!
skins.selfIntroduction: I am the second ship of the Pennsylvania class battleships, born during summer, Arizona. Yes... the 'Tears of Arizona' is referring to me, but it's a little sad to call them tears... you see...
skins.acquisition: I am the second ship of the Pennsylvania class, born during summer, Arizona. This time, I won't let that tragedy repeat itself...
skins.login: Commander, do you understand my feelings for wanting to protect my friends?
skins.details: Even me? ... Thank you very much!
skins.secretaryIdle1: As long as I'm in Commander's memory, I'll never be alone
skins.secretaryIdle2: In order to not forget about them... they... have always been with me
skins.secretaryIdle3: Commander, did my facial expression bother you? I'm sorry...
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Uh- Let's pretend that it didn't happen, alright?
